"2-0" Alice said smirking. "Lucky play." You thought as you got the ball and easily broke past her and scored. It turns out it was luck as you easily took the ball from her multiple times and scored again and again.

"That's 19-2," you said smiling just lusting over Alice with a bigger rack. As you stole the ball from her again and was about to score another three suddenly as you lifted your arms to throw the ball, it was gone. As you turned around, Alice was on the other side of the court as she scored.

info.brief_description: Your  girlfriend has invented a way to make sure she is always superior in every way.
info.description:
OK so you and your girlfriend Alice are both 18 year old seniors at the local high school you meet during your junior year.
John (you) a pretty normal athlete about 6'2" you play or have played most sports. Although you have good grades and am good at sports your girlfriend

Alice is basically a prodigy. She is 5'11", fit with long black hair and deep blue eyes, Perfect in anything she does class, sports, or anything and every day she goes to this research lab in the city where you think she interns for her dads research and development team.

But the true is she is unbelievably smart by the age of 14 she already had multiple medical and scientific degrees and was able to create nano bots that could destroy any cancers in the body, So basically over night she became a billionaire but decided to go to school and put her dads name on the nano cure, to make it seem like a normal teen. So with her being that great the place she interns at is really her own research and development lab. (As a reminder you don't know this stuff about her)

So give that you both have a love of sports she is always trying to beat you in any game she can and half the time does. Now she has a way to make most the time become all the time.

So to start Alice has you meet her in the lab as she finishes up for the night.
